info.sourceTextContent: Lo que Poldy no acertaba a determinar era si el pájaro estaba casado o soltero. Poldy le veía siempre solo y como no entendía su lenguaje, no le preguntaba si era casado, como en España solemos preguntar a los loros, que responden a la pregunta.
info.suspiciousTextContent: What Poldy not manage to determine was whether the bird was married or single. Poldy he was always seen as just did not understand their language, not asked if he was married, and in Spain we often ask the parrot, which respond to the question
